info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about Excuse mewhich way is Marcel Duchamp's urinal?
info.completion: A man is walking around a museum looking for the urinal that was made famous by Marcel Duchamp. He asks a security guard for directions and the guard tells him it's just down the hall. The man thanks the guard and starts to walk away.Suddenly, he realizes he has no idea who Marcel Duchamp is or what his urinal looks like. He goes back to the security guard and asks him to describe the urinal. The guard gives him a blank stare and says, "It's a urinal."

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about I put some beer on the hook. I figure if that's what got him into this mess it should be able to get him out.
info.completion: I put some beer on the hook and wait for a while. Nothing happens. I start to get impatient and shake the can a little. Suddenly, the top pops off and beer sprays all over me. I jump back in surprise and fall into the water. As I surface, I see the fish swimming away with my can of beer still in its mouth.

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about Don't look at me that wayI wanted a giant cat.
info.completion: I went to the pet store and told the clerk I wanted a giant cat. She looked at me funny and said, "We don't have any giant cats." I said, "Don't look at me that way. I know what you're thinking. You're thinking, 'This woman is crazy. She wants a giant cat!'"

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about I wanted you to meet our colon specialist before we miniaturized him.
info.completion:
A: I wanted you to meet our colon specialist before we miniaturized him.

B: Why? Is he going on a trip?

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about He has a summer job as a scarecrow.
info.completion: He's not the best at his job, and often falls asleep on the job. One day, a group of birds start pecking at him and he wakes up to find himself covered in feathers.

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about And tomorrow there's a twenty-per-cent chance of anvils.
info.completion: A man walks into a bar and asks for a drink. The bartender says, "I'm sorry, sir, but we're out of alcohol." The man says, "That's OK, I'll just have a glass of water." The bartender says, "I'm sorry, sir, but we're also out of water." The man looks around the bar and sees a sign that says, "And tomorrow there's a twenty-per-cent chance of anvils."

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about We're all out of the blood of your enemies.  You'll have to settle for marmalade.
info.completion: What do you call a vampire with no blood in its veins? A vam-pithy!

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about Don't sexual fantasies usually involve sex at some point?
info.completion: What do you call a sexual fantasy that doesn't involve sex? A daydream.

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about You said B.Y.O.B., right?
info.completion:
You said B.Y.O.B., right?


I showed up to the party with a six-pack of beer and was surprised to see that everyone else had brought their own wine.

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about Janice, hold all my calls. Indefinitely.
info.completion:
Janice: I'm sorry, what did you say your name was?

Caller: Uh, Janice. I called to talk to you about the project we're working on.

Janice: Oh, right. Hold on a sec. Let me just find my notes. *muffled sounds as Janice searches for her notes* Okay, I've got them. Now, what were you saying?

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about Forget Oregon. I'm going to Vegas.
info.completion: Two guys are on a road trip and they're driving through Oregon. One guy says to the other, "I've always wanted to visit Oregon." The other guy says, "Forget Oregon. I'm going to Vegas."

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about It just looked so uncool to wear a seat belt in the Batmobile.
info.completion:
Batman: I just looked so uncool to wear a seat belt in the Batmobile.

Robin: Well, you should have thought of that before you got in!

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about When you don't want one, they're everywhere.
info.completion: You're at a party and you see someone you don't want to talk to. You try to avoid them, but they keep following you around the room. Finally, you turn to them and say, "I'm sorry, I don't want to hear any of your jokes."

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about I couldn't find a real naked woman to ride with me in the H.O.V. lane.
info.completion: I couldn't find a real naked woman to ride with me in the H.O.V. lane, so I had to settle for a blow-up doll.

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about I'm haunted by the faces of my victims.
info.completion: I'm haunted by the faces of my victims. They all look so surprised.
